# External Sector (Task E) — Trade & CA Proxy

## What this module can and cannot prove
- **Can prove (with this dataset):** two-point change decomposition (2024-11 vs 2025-11; also YTD 1–11) on export destination mix and levels.
- **Cannot prove:** time-series persistence, FX/PPI regression effects, or structural trend claims beyond the two observed points.

## Outputs
- `output/external/trade_tidy.csv`
- `output/external/trade_two_point_panel_11月.csv` (and/or `..._1至11月.csv`)
- `output/external/figures/export_value_compare_*.png`
- `output/external/figures/export_share_delta_*.png`
- `output/external/ca_proxy_*.csv`
